name: kelmah-mongodb-migration
description: Database migration scripts from SQL (Sequelize) to MongoDB

scripts.test-connection: node -e "require('mongoose').connect(process.env.MONGODB_URI || 'mongodb://localhost:27017/kelmah').then(() => { console.log('✅ MongoDB connected'); process.exit(0); }).catch(err => { console.error('❌ MongoDB connection failed:', err.message); process.exit(1); });"

author: Kelmah Development Team
